name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D配信】４周年記念ミニライブ【＃ときのそら4周年】 [s7hakOSsU-I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs 'Yoru ni Kakeru' (Into The Night).
Transition between songs with background music.
MC section where Sora interacts with the audience after the songs.

subtitles.original: …寄り添って溶けてゆく　あー
subtitles.english: ...snuggling and melting away, ahh

subtitles.original: 変わらない日々に泣いていた僕を
subtitles.english: I was crying in the unchanging days

subtitles.original: 君は優しく終りへと誘う
subtitles.english: And you gently invite me to the end

subtitles.original: 沈むように溶けてゆくように
subtitles.english: As if sinking, as if melting away

subtitles.original: 染み付いた霧が晴れる
subtitles.english: The ingrained mist clears up

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまいたくて閉じ込めた日々に
subtitles.english: In the days I shut away wanting to forget

subtitles.original: 差し伸べてくれた君の手を取る
subtitles.english: I take your hand that you reached out to me

subtitles.original: 涼しい風が空を泳ぐように今吹き抜けてゆく
subtitles.english: A cool breeze blows through now as if swimming in the sky

subtitles.original: 繋いだ手を離さないでよ
subtitles.english: Don't let go of our joined hands

subtitles.original: 二人今、夜に駆け出していく
subtitles.english: The two of us are now racing out into the night

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール
subtitles.english: Android Girl

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール
subtitles.english: Android Girl

subtitles.original: もう一回、一生分の作りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's make a lifetime's worth once more

subtitles.original: 君とのマッチアップの過程
subtitles.english: The process of matching up with you

subtitles.original: 構ってもらって足りないの
subtitles.english: I can't get enough of your attention

subtitles.original: 歌え、思い出染みた執奏のスタイル
subtitles.english: Sing, the style of persistent performance stained with memories

subtitles.original: カラフルカラフル傷つけては
subtitles.english: Colorful, colorful, hurting each other

subtitles.original: もうしないって嘘で仲直りごっこだ
subtitles.english: Playing at making up with "won't do it again" lies

subtitles.original: 勘違いの騙し合い
subtitles.english: Mutual deception of misunderstandings

subtitles.original: 目を見ればすぐにわかるって馬鹿みたい
subtitles.english: Saying you'll know just by looking in my eyes is like a fool

subtitles.original: 妄想に耽って言うほど
subtitles.english: As much as you say while indulging in delusions

subtitles.original: この愛は腐ってるんだよ
subtitles.english: This love is rotten

subtitles.original: 早く、気付いてんだよ
subtitles.english: Quickly, I've noticed

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、可笑しくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Android Girl, I've gone crazy

subtitles.original: 僕だけのものになった君は誰なの
subtitles.english: Who are you who became mine alone?

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと信じてきたのにね
subtitles.english: Even though I believed for so, so long

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、思いはなんだっけ
subtitles.english: Android Girl, what were my thoughts again?

subtitles.original: 君とのキスが痛くて息を閉じたの
subtitles.english: The kiss with you was so painful I stopped breathing

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと何の愛を再起動したって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I reboot what kind of love

subtitles.original: ちょっとだって代われやしないよ
subtitles.english: Not even a little bit can be replaced

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: あー可愛いね、どうしたくないよ
subtitles.english: Ah, you're cute, I don't want to do anything about it

subtitles.original: もう疲れた、ドキドキさせるお世辞のリサイズ
subtitles.english: I'm tired already, resizing the flattery that makes my heart race

subtitles.original: ウザい、ウザいの並行罪
subtitles.english: Annoying, annoying parallel crimes

subtitles.original: 独占性の顔わからなくなったよ
subtitles.english: I've lost sight of the face of exclusivity

subtitles.original: エンドロールはまだですか
subtitles.english: Are the end credits not here yet?

subtitles.original: どこにいても一緒だなんてマジで痛い
subtitles.english: Saying we're together wherever we are is seriously painful

subtitles.original: 感傷に浸っていいかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay to soak in sentimentality?

subtitles.original: あの頃を願っていいかな
subtitles.english: Is it okay to wish for those days?

subtitles.original: ありか、なしか、教えてよ
subtitles.english: Is it a yes or a no, tell me

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、可笑しくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Android Girl, I've gone crazy

subtitles.original: 君だけのものになった僕が好きなの
subtitles.english: Do you like me who became yours alone?

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと騙してきたんだね
subtitles.english: You've been deceiving me for so, so long, haven't you?

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、思いはなんだっけ
subtitles.english: Android Girl, what were my thoughts again?

subtitles.original: 錆びついた腕で何度も僕を求めた
subtitles.english: You sought me many times with rusted arms

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと何の愛を再起動したって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I reboot what kind of love

subtitles.original: ちょっとだって代われやしないよ
subtitles.english: Not even a little bit can be replaced

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、可笑しくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Android Girl, I've gone crazy

subtitles.original: 僕だけのものになった君は誰なの
subtitles.english: Who are you who became mine alone?

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと信じてきたのにね
subtitles.english: Even though I believed for so, so long

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、思いはなんだっけ
subtitles.english: Android Girl, what were my thoughts again?

subtitles.original: 君とのキスが痛くて息を閉じたの
subtitles.english: The kiss with you was so painful I stopped breathing

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと
subtitles.english: Always, always

subtitles.original: わがままが離れない
subtitles.english: Selfishness won't leave

subtitles.original: 君だけは許さない
subtitles.english: I won't forgive only you

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、可笑しくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: Android Girl, I've gone crazy

subtitles.original: 君だけのものになった僕が好きなの
subtitles.english: Do you like me who became yours alone?

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと騙してきたんだね
subtitles.english: You've been deceiving me for so, so long, haven't you?

subtitles.original: アンドロイドガール、思いはなんだっけ
subtitles.english: Android Girl, what were my thoughts again?

subtitles.original: 錆びついた腕で何度も僕を求めた
subtitles.english: You sought me many times with rusted arms

subtitles.original: ずっと、ずっと何の愛を再起動したって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I reboot what kind of love

subtitles.original: ちょっとだって代われやしないよ
subtitles.english: Not even a little bit can be replaced

subtitles.original: 何の愛を再起動したって
subtitles.english: No matter what kind of love I reboot

subtitles.original: ちょっとだって代われやしないよ
subtitles.english: Not even a little bit can be replaced

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで2曲連続歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: Yes! And so, I sang two songs in a row.

subtitles.original: えー、どちらも生で歌うのは初めてで、めちゃくちゃ緊張してたんですけど、いかがだったでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Uh, it was my first time singing both of them live, so I was super nervous, but how was it?

subtitles.original: 今日はね、えっと、今は...
subtitles.english: Today, well, right now...
